chú thích báo.{{chú thích báo |first: Carol|last= Kino|authorlink= |title=Once Inspired by a War, Now by the Land |url=http://www.nytimes.com/2008/11/09/arts/design/09kino.html |quote=On a gray, unusually muggy October day the artist and architect Maya Lin was showing a visitor around "Wave Field," her new earthwork project at the Storm King Art Center here. The 11-acre installation, which will open to the public next spring, consists of seven rows of undulating hills cradled in a gently sloping valley. |work=New York Times |date=ngày 7 tháng 11 năm 2008 |access-date =ngày 9 tháng 11 năm 2008 }}
